name: Grout's Gritty Gauntlet
description:
Morgrout the Gargoyle welcomes travelers to attempt his Gritty Gauntlet! Try to make it through the non-linear dungeon before battling the Gauntlet Golem and reap the rewards!

Featured here is a style of dungeon navigation I've been workshopping for a few months. (No super snappy name has been crafted yet.) 

This project was put together over a 24 hour period as an experiment to see if I could go from concept to product in such a short time. Granted, the exploration mechanic was pretty fleshed out prior to starting, but I'm quite proud of what I made all the same.

BONUS CONTENT UNLOCKED!

6 New Chamber Challenges are now available in the Bonus Content PDF! Take on the Chicken Man, save Murl (or don't), and drink lemonade!

Download Includes:

  • Grout's Gritty Gauntlet PDF
  • GGG Bonus Content PDF
  • GGG Printout in Color and B&W

I'd like to create more content for Morgrout's Gauntlet!
